abstract: The wheels of justice apparently grind too slowly for rival natural gas distributors Dominion Resources and Equitable Resources, which announced Tuesday that they’ve abandoned a merger they announced in 2006.
lead_paragraph: The wheels of justice apparently grind too slowly for rival natural gas distributors Dominion Resources and Equitable Resources, which announced Tuesday that they’ve abandoned a merger they announced in 2006.

headline.main: Dominion and Equitable Hang Up on Merger Plan
